pages.text: It is not befitting for me to say anything concerning Allah except the truth. I have brought you the clear proofs from my Lord. So let the children of Israel accompany me
The pharaoh said, "If you are telling the truth, and if you have really brought the sign, then present it
So, Musa threw down his staff and suddenly it became a real live serpent
He pulled out his hand (from his pocket) and it appeared dazzling white to the viewers
The chiefs of the nation of pharaoh said, "Of course he is an expert magician
He wants to drive you out of your land. Now, what do you suggest
They advised the pharaoh, "Hold him and his brother for a while and send announcers in all the towns
They will summon all the expert magicians in your presence
The magicians came to the pharaoh and said, "There would surely be a (handsome) reward for us if we triumph, wouldn´t there
The pharaoh said, "Of course, and you would also be close to me as my courtiers
They said, "Oh Musa! Either you cast your spell, or let us be the ones to go (first)
Musa said, "You go (first)." As they cast their spells, they bewitched people´s eyes and struck them with awe. They conjured up an awesome magic
We inspired Musa, "Throw your staff!" and immediately it swallowed up their conjured up illusions
Thus, the truth was vindicated. Everything they had done came to no avail
The magicians were defeated there and then. They were utterly disgraced
The magicians threw themselves on the ground prostrate
